title: How Apple’s privacy endeavors aim to dismantle the digital advertising industry
content:
For years, Apple has been vocal about its belief that privacy is a fundamental human right. In 2020, its decision to diminish iPhone ad tracking sparked a debate between executives about just how far the company will go to stop this pursuit. 

more…

The post How Apple’s privacy endeavors aim to dismantle the digital advertising industry appeared first on 9to5Mac.
description: Apple's decision to diminish iPhone ad tracking sparked a debate about just how far the company will go to enhance privacy.
